name: Crazy Colour Compounds
description:
Crazy Colour Compounds is hectic game of hitting moving objects with a target colour to aim for. The closer you get to clicking the object with a colour nearest the target colour, the more points you achieve. 

You can also try and get the bonus objects (these are larger but rarer):

*To get a boost on your score*

*To make all objects larger for a set time and therefore easier to hit*

*To make many objects on screen fade out for a set time to focus on getting the correct colour*

*To slow down time*

*To get 100 objects appear that are the target colour at that time*

Music from https://filmmusic.io "Who Likes to Party" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
